thread.title: Everyone hates Roger Goodell, including fans at the 24 Hours of Daytona.
thread.title_full: Everyone hates Roger Goodell, including fans at the 24 Hours of Daytona.

author: Stef Schrader on Black Flag, shared by Stef Schrader to Jalopnik
title: Everyone hates Roger Goodell, including fans at the 24 Hours of Daytona.
text:
Go to permalink Photo credit: Stef Schrader 
Everyone hates Roger Goodell , including fans at the 24 Hours of Daytona. This New England Patriots fan’s “#FIREGOODELL” love note to the NFL commissioner was spotted among fan signatures on the low yellow line around Daytona before today’s Rolex 24.
